div.ab: A woman who goes to sleep (to lie?) with difficulty: Take a (???) that you find in a deer(???)

When a man has constipation(???)(?): So take eggs and boil the yolks from them, and mix rose oil in there and put it on a cloth and when the man goes to defecate lay it on the (???) or in [his] bottom(?). So will he heal.
